metadata.description: As Darkseid wages a war of evil in the far future of FINAL CRISIS, the Legion of Super-Heroes and the Man of Steel contend with colliding timelines and the villainous Time Trapper! Geoff Johns (GREEN LANTERN) teams with George Perez (AVENGERS, JUSTICE LEAGUE OF AMERICA) for a legendary Legion tale!
metadata.name: Final Crisis: Legion of Three Worlds
